01Welcome.H1: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}About to do your first master?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Prêt pour votre premier master ?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}¿Estás listo para tu primer máster?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Prestes a fazer o seu primeiro master?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Du willst bald mastern? {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Stai per fare il tuo primo master?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}初めてのマスタリングってどうしたらいい？{% else %}About to do your first master?{% endif %}
01Welcome.body:
{% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}Here are some things to prepare for the perfect master:

Keep the peak level on your master fader around -6dB
Don't use plugins on your master bus for the sake of loudnessing (mastering will take care of that for you)
Upload WAV or AIFF format for the best possible LANDR master

Need more info?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Voici quelques règles à suivre pour préparer votre mix à un master parfait :

gardez vos pics les plus forts sous les -6 dB
n'utilisez pas de plugins sur votre master bus juste pour augmenter le volume (le mastering s'en chargera pour vous)
uploadez des fichiers au format WAV ou AIFF pour obtenir un master LANDR de meilleure qualité

Besoin de plus d'infos ?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}Aquí hay algunas cosas que debes preparar para un máster perfecto:

Mantén el nivel de los picos de tu máster alrededor de -6dB
No uses plugins en tu máster bus solo para aumentar el volumen (la masterización se encargará de eso por ti)
Sube un archivo en formato WAV o AIFF para el mejor máster LANDR posible.

¿Necesitas más información?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Eis algumas coisas a serem preparadas para o master perfeito:

Mantenha o nível de pico em torno de -6dB no seu master fader
Não use plugins no seu master bus somente para aumentar a intensidade (a masterização vai tomar conta disso para você)
Faça o upload de formatos de arquivo em WAV ou AIFF para conceber o melhor master possível com a LANDR

Precisa de mais informações?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Hier sind ein paar Tipps, die dir dabei helfen, deinen Mix so vorzubereiten, dass du den perfekten Master bekommst:

Der Spitzenwert deines Master-Faders sollte bei ca. -6dB liegen.
Du solltest keine Plugins auf deinem Master-Bus anwenden, die lediglich dem Anheben der Lautstärke dienen (das wird beim Mastering erledigt).
Lade eine WAV- oder AIFF-Datei hoch, um den bestmöglichen LANDR-Master zu erhalten.

Du brauchst mehr Infos?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Ecco alcune cose da preparare per un master perfetto:

Mantieni il livello di picco sul tuo master fader intorno a -6dB
Non utilizzare plugin sul tuo bus master per motivi di volume (il mastering si prenderà cura di questo per te)
Carica WAV o AIFF per il miglior master possibile con LANDR

Hai bisogno di maggiori informazioni?{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}完璧なマスタリングをするためには、以下のことに気をつけましょう：

マスターフェーダーのピークレベルを-6dB前後に保ちます。
音圧稼ぎのためにマスターバスにプラグインを使用しないでください（マスタリングがそれを処理します）。
最適な音質のためにWAVまたはAIFF形式で作品をアップロードしてください。

もっと詳しく知りたい場合は、{% else %}Here are some things to prepare for the perfect master:

Keep the peak level on your master fader around -6dB
Don't use plugins on your master bus for the sake of loudnessing (mastering will take care of that for you)
Upload WAV or AIFF format for the best possible LANDR master

Need more info?{% endif %}
01Welcome.cta: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}Here's our guide on preparing your music for LANDR Mastering{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Voici notre guide pour préparer votre musique au mastering LANDR{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}Aquí está nuestra guía acerca de cómo preparar tu música para masterización de LANDR{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Aqui vai um guia sobre como preparar sua música para a masterização LANDR{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Hier ist unser Leitfaden für die Vorbereitung deiner Musik aufs LANDR-Mastering{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Ecco la nostra guida su come prepare musica per LANDR Mastering{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}社ブログ記事のLANDRマスタリング用の曲の準備の仕方を参考にしてください{% else %}Here's our guide on preparing your music for LANDR Mastering{% endif %}
01Welcome.link: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}blog.landr.com/prepare-music-landr-mastering/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=en{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}blog.landr.com/fr/comment-preparer-votre-morceau-pour-le-mastering-landr/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=fr{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}blog.landr.com/es/preparar-musica-para-masterizacion-landr/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=es{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}blog.landr.com/prepare-music-landr-mastering/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=pt{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}blog.landr.com/de/wie-du-deine-tracks-fuer-das-landr-mastering-vorbereitest/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=de{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}blog.landr.com/prepare-music-landr-mastering/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=it{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}blog.landr.com/ja/prepare-music-landr-mastering-ja/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=ja{% else %}blog.landr.com/prepare-music-landr-mastering/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=01Welcome&utm_term=en{% endif %}

02FinishTrack.body:
{% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}Hey {{customer['L - User First Name']}},


Looks like you uploaded a track but didn't master it.

Finish your track now or {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Bonjour {{customer['L - User First Name']}},


On dirait que vous avez uploadé un morceau sans le masteriser.

Finissez-le aujourd'hui ou {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}Hola {{customer['L - User First Name']}}​,


Parece que has subido una canción pero no la has masterizado.

Completa tu masterización ahora o {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Olá {{customer['L - User First Name']}},

Parece que você fez o upload de uma faixa mas não a masterizou.

Termine sua faixa agora ou
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Hallo {{customer['L - User First Name']}},

sieht so aus, als hättest du einen Track hochgeladen, ihn jedoch nicht gemastert.

Stelle deinen Track jetzt fertig oder wende dich an unser {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Ciao {{customer['L - User First Name']}}


Sembra che tu abbia caricato una traccia ma non l'abbia masterizzata.

Finalizza la tua traccia ora o {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}こんにちは{{customer['L - User First Name']}}さん、

曲をアップロードされたようですが、まだマスタリングが済んでいないようです。

今すぐ曲を完成させるか、{% else %}Hey {{customer['L - User First Name']}},


Looks like you uploaded a track but didn't master it.

Finish your track now or {% endif %}
02FinishTrack.cta: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}contact support if you're stuck.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}contactez notre support si vous êtes bloqués.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}contacta con nuestro equipo si estás atascado.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}contacte o suporte ao cliente se você estiver bloqueado.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Support-Team, falls es Probleme gibt.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}contatta l'assistenza, se sei bloccato.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}なにか質問等がある場合はサポートにご連絡してください。{% else %}contact support if you're stuck.{% endif %}
02FinishTrack.link: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}support.landr.com/hc/en-us/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=en{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}support.landr.com/hc/fr/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=fr{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}support.landr.com/hc/es/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=es{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}support.landr.com/hc/pt/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=pt{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}support.landr.com/hc/de/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=de{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}support.landr.com/hc/it/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=it{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}support.landr.com/hc/ja/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=ja{% else %}support.landr.com/hc/en-us/?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=02FinishTrack&utm_term=en{% endif %}

03DoAnother.body:
{% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}Congrats on your first master!

Just a reminder, you still have one free master left for this month. Use it now before it's too late!
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Bravo pour votre premier master !


N'oubliez pas, il vous reste un master gratuit ce mois-ci. Profitez-en maintenant avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}¡Enhorabuena! ¡Acabas de masterizar tu primera canción!


Recuera que aún te queda una masterización gratis este mes. ¡Úsala antes de que sea demasiado tarde!
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Parabéns pelo seu primeiro master!

Só um lembrete, você ainda tem uma faixa gratuita restante para esse mês. Utilize-a agora antes que seja tarde!

{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum ersten Master!


Nur zur Erinnerung: Du hast noch einen Master übrig für diesen Monat. Nutze ihn, bevor’s zu spät ist!
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Congratulazioni per il tuo primo master!


Solo un promemoria, hai ancora un master rimasto per questo mese. Usalo ora prima che sia troppo tardi!
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}最初のマスタリング完了おめでとうございます！

お知らせですが、まだ今月１回の無料マスタリングが残っています。 来月が来る前に使ってしまってください！
{% else %}Congrats on your first master!

Just a reminder, you still have one free master left for this month. Use it now before it's too late!
{% endif %}

04PricingPage.body:
{% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}You've already heard the power of our mastering engine.

Pro-tip: go unlimited with one of our paid plans and make instant mastering part of your process. {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Vous avez déjà découvert la puissance de notre logiciel de mastering.

Conseil de pro : passez à l'illimité avec un de nos abonnements payants et intégrez le mastering instantané à votre processus de production.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}Ya has descubierto el poder de nuestro motor de masterización.

Consejo práctico: Consigue masterización ilimitada con uno de nuestros planes de pago e integra la masterización instantánea a tu proceso creativo.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Você já ouviu o poder do nosso motor de masterização.

Dica: tenha acesso ilimitado com um de nossos planos pagos e faça da masterização instantânea uma parte do seu processo de produção. {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Du konntest dich bereits davon überzeugen, was unser Mastering-Algorithmus so drauf hat.


Profi-Tipp: Hol dir unbegrenzte Master mit einem unserer zahlungspflichtigen Abos und mache so umgehendes Mastering zum festen Bestandteil deines Prozesses.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Hai già sentito il potere del nostro motore di masterizzazione.


Suggerimento Pro: passa ad illimitato con uno dei nostri piani a pagamento e rendi il mastering istantaneo parte del tuo processo.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}LANDRのマスタリングエンジンの凄さの噂は多分小耳に挟んでいると思います。

プロのヒント：有料プランの１つを選び、無制限マスタリングにアップグレード。そして、マスタリングを日常の音楽制作のプロセスの一部に。{% else %}You've already heard the power of our mastering engine.

Pro-tip: go unlimited with one of our paid plans and make instant mastering part of your process. {% endif %}
04PricingPage.cta: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}Subscribe now{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}Abonnez-vous dès maintenant{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}Suscríbete ahora{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}Assine agora{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}Jetzt Abo abschließen{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}Iscriviti{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}今すぐ購読する{% else %}Subscribe now{% endif %}
04PricingPage.link: {% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=en{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=fr{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=es{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=pt{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=de{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=it{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=ja{% else %}app.landr.com/purchase/pricing?utm_source=landr_cs&utm_medium=inapp&utm_campaign=ONB-Mastering&utm_content=04PricingPage&utm_term=en{% endif %}

05GetFeedback.body:
{% if {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'en' %}
Getting feedback on tracks is one of the biggest problems musicians face. We make it easy for you to get that precious information.

Just click the "Add Collaborators" button and share with your creative network to improve your sound.
{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'fr' %}
Obtenir des avis sur sa musique est l'un des principaux problèmes rencontrés par les musiciens. Nous avons décidé de vous faciliter la tâche.

Cliquez simplement sur le lien "Ajouter des collaborateurs" pour partager vos projets avec votre réseau et améliorer votre son. {% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'es' %}La obtención de feedback de canciones es uno de los mayores problemas para los músicos. Por eso hemos hecho que resulte más fácil que nunca.

Simplemente haz clic en el botón "Añadir colaboradores" y comparte tu canción con tus contactos creativos para mejorar tu sonido.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'pt' %}
Ter feedback sobre as faixas é um dos maiores problemas enfrentado pelos músicos. Nós facilitamos esse processo para que você obtenha essa informação preciosa.

Basta clicar no botão "Adicionar Colaboradores" e compartilhar com a sua rede criativa para otimizar o seu som.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'de' %}
Eine der größten Schwierigkeiten für Musiker besteht darin, nützliches Feedback zu ihren Tracks zu bekommen. Wir machen es dir leicht, an diese wertvolle Information zu gelangen.

Klicke einfach auf "Mitwirkende hinzufügen" und teile deine Tracks mit deinem kreativen Netzwerk, um deinen Sound zu verbessern.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'it' %}
Ottenere feedback sulle proprie tracce è uno dei maggiori problemi che devono affrontare i musicisti. Ti facilitiamo noi il processo per ottenere queste preziose informazioni.

Fai clic sul pulsante "Aggiungi collaboratori" e condividi con la tua rete creativa per migliorare il tuo suono.{% elsif {{customer['L - User Language']}} contains 'ja' %}
多くのミュージシャンが直面する問題の1つに、自分の曲に対する真剣な感想をもらう機会がないが上げられます。だからLANDRはその貴重な機会をすべてのユーザーに提供いたします。

[共同編集者を追加] ボタンをクリックし、クリエイティブネットワークと共有してどんどん作品を次のレベルにステップアップ。{% else %}
Getting feedback on tracks is one of the biggest problems musicians face. We make it easy for you to get that precious information.

Just click the "Add Collaborators" button and share with your creative network to improve your sound.
{% endif %}
